de.uniks.se1ss19teamb.rbsg.chat

Class Chat

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniks.se1ss19teamb.rbsg.chat.Chat

  • public class Chat
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to send public and private messages and provides chat history functionality.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.nio.file.Path chatLogPath
      The path at which the chat log is saved.
      ChatMessageHandler chatMessageHandler
      Defines that and how received messages are added to the chat history.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chat(AbstractMessageWebSocket messageWebSocket, java.nio.file.Path path)
      Constructor that connects to the chat socket and registers the chatMessageHandler.

      Commonly used incoming message processing, like message decryption.
      void deleteHistory()
      Deletes the chat history file.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects the chat socket, writes the chat history to file and logs the user out.

      • Chat

        public Chat(AbstractMessageWebSocket messageWebSocket,
            java.nio.file.Path path)
        Constructor that connects to the chat socket and registers the chatMessageHandler.

        messageWebSocket - The chat socket for communication.
        path - The location at which the chat history is saved.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultMessageHandler

        public static void defaultMessageHandler(com.google.gson.JsonObject response,
                                         boolean ignoreOwn,
                                         java.lang.String userName,
                                         java.util.List<ChatMessageHandler> handlersChat)
        Commonly used incoming message processing, like message decryption.
        Parameters:
        response - The message to process.
        ignoreOwn - Indicates whether to ignore messages from the same username as the currently logged in one.
        userName - The username from which the message was sent.
        handlersChat - The handler to further process this message with.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects the chat socket, writes the chat history to file and logs the user out.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a public message via the chat socket.
        Parameters:
        message - The textual content.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String message,
                        java.lang.String receiver)
        Sends a private message via the chat socket.
        Parameters:
        message - The textual content.
        receiver - The receiver's name.

      • executeCommandsOnMessage

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> executeCommandsOnMessage(java.lang.String message,
                                                                            java.lang.String receiver)
        Executes commands contained in chat messages, like encryption.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to process.
        receiver - The receiver's username.
        Returns:
        Optionally, the processed message.

      • deleteHistory

        public void deleteHistory()
        Deletes the chat history file.
